metadata.title: CVE-2021-37232 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A stack overflow vulnerability occurs in Atomicparsley20210124.204813.840499f through APar_read64() in src/util.cpp due to thelack of buffer size of uint32_buffer while reading more bytes inAPar_read64.

criterions.comment: atomicparsley package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
